data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Will Vaulks scores to make it 1-0 at Cardiff City Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Cardiff City Stadium.
Sergi Canos is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 56, Will Vaulks (Cardiff) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Brentford take a 1-2 lead thanks to Sergi Canos.
Mark Harris is replacing Junior Hoilett for Cardiff at Cardiff City Stadium.
In the minute 73, Sergi Canos puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-3.
The home team have replaced Sheyi Ojo with Josh Murphy. This is the second substitution made today by Neil Harris.
Sean Morrison puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-3.
In the minute 77, Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a first substitution, with Tarique Fosu replacing Bryan Mbeumo.
Dean Whitestone blows to end the match. The final score is 2-3.
Joshua Da Silva is replacing Mathias Jensen for the away team.
Marcus Forss is on a sub for Sergi Canos for Brentford.
